titleStmt.title: The line of liberalitie dulie directinge the wel bestowing of benefites and reprehending the comonly vsed vice of ingratitude. Anno. 1569.
De beneficiis. Book 1-3. English
titleStmt.author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
Haward, Nicholas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete neare to S. Dunstones Church by Thomas Marshe,

notesStmt.note: A translation from books 1-3 of: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus. De beneficiis.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: *⁴ A-Q R⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
